Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'For our final session, Commandant, we will be doing field testing today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Although it's called field testing, we'll only be tackling a mission that seems doable by myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are those Corrupted your targets?', 3: '14', 4: 'Can you handle them all on your own?', 5: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll be fine. I've already done my pre-battle preparations.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Isn't it the one that got away last time?", 3: '31', 4: 'Where did it come from?', 5: '31'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The Corrupted who escaped because of my mistake... Good... Let me show you what I've learnt!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Wait, Liv! Let's contact Lucia and Lee first!", 3: '37', 4: "I'll help.", 5: '39'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That's not necessary... I've completed my calculation on this Corrupted as well!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That's not necessary... You just have to observe like before, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's spinning...?! That's not a move in my calculation!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Levi-Gun ready! Minimum firing distance reached! Fire!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But I still had to rely on you in the end, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If I want to contribute instead of dragging you behind, I'll have to accomplish something on my own without you...", 4: '1'}
{2: "But if you could do that, you wouldn't need me anymore.", 3: '71', 4: 'I would love to have you rely on me.', 5: '73'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Ah... I didn't say I don't need you... Hmm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, you always undermine my goal like this!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Then... before I can stand on my own...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Will you please watch over me, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
